channel.title: Comments on: More fun with arrays in protovis

item.title: By: dotnetCarpenter
item.dc:creator: dotnetCarpenter
item.description: Regarding Visualizing arrays, you can always use console.dir to get both Firebug and Chrome Dev tools (and IE with the console open, Opera DragonFly and Safari) to output all children of a given object. It's also formatted more nicely than JSON.stringify. Ei. console.dir(barley)
item.content:encoded:
Regarding Visualizing arrays, you can always use console.dir to get both Firebug and Chrome Dev tools (and IE with the console open, Opera DragonFly and Safari) to output all children of a given object. It’s also formatted more nicely than JSON.stringify.
Ei. console.dir(barley)
